mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.wechat_user AS "wechatUser", a.report_info AS "reportInfo", a.report_time AS "reportTime", a.state AS "state", a.status AS "status", a.user_tel AS "userTel", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", (case a.status when 01 then '未处理' when 02 then '处理中' when 03 then '已完成' else '' end) "statusLable", (case a.state when 01 then '未读' when 02 then '已读未回复' when 03 then '已回复' when 03 then '完成' else '' end) "stateLable"
mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM ccm_wechat_event_attachment b WHERE b.event_id = #{id} AND b.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_wechat_event( id, wechat_user, report_info, report_time, state, status, user_tel, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{wechatUser}, #{reportInfo}, #{reportTime}, #{state}, #{status}, #{userTel}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_wechat_event SET wechat_user = #{wechatUser}, report_info = #{reportInfo}, report_time = #{reportTime}, state = #{state}, status = #{status}, user_tel = #{userTel}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
